Text: ....Walking Dead and playboy in the same sentence just makes me question Kirkman's thinking
Thank you for this.   Good job.

@Lyxnman, it's quite simple really. He'll do ANYTHING that puts a buck in his pocket. The show and the unnecessary mess they're doing of the story with his help is proof of it.

Now I only download his stuff, do not spend money on it anymore, and don't feel the least bit guilty. It's karma really.
